channel.title: An online diary and information on our Sussex Garden
channel.description: An online diary and information on our Sussex Garden

item.title: A potted history of the garden
item.description:
A potted history of the garden

The house was built in 1949 â€“ the first one of six in a cornfield - by generation 1. The plot is on the south edge of a small Sussex village. The house and garden face south with a distant view of the South Downs.

item.title: First things first
item.description: Who we are and what we are nattering about.... well the first is quite easy.... a husband and wife team where he is the keen photographer and she is the (slightly obsessive) gardener.
